overview:
House & Hoffman Consultants provides metrics-based strategy and analysis for social media and advertising.

Metrics prove and improve the effectiveness of corporate communication campaigns, and allow you to: Know exactly where to find your audience/key public/market. Create ads and messages for maximum impact. Communicate the value of your work in compelling numbers.

House & Hoffman Consultants exists to empower communications professionals with insights and measurement. We simplify complicated analytics to fit your marketing, public relations and advertising work flows.
